net.powermatcher.core.concentrator

Class Concentrator

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.powermatcher.core.BaseAgent
      • net.powermatcher.core.BaseAgentEndpoint
        • net.powermatcher.core.concentrator.Concentrator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Agent, AgentEndpoint, MatcherEndpoint, ObservableAgent
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PeakShavingConcentrator

    public class Concentrator
extends BaseAgentEndpoint
implements MatcherEndpoint

    This class represents a Concentrator component where several instances can be created.

    The Concentrator receives Bid from the agents and forwards this in an aggregate Bid up in the hierarchy to a Concentrator or to the Auctioneer. It will receive price updates from the Auctioneer and forward them to its connected agents.

      • handlePriceUpdate

        public void handlePriceUpdate(PriceUpdate priceUpdate)
        Called by MatcherEndpoint via the Session to update the Price used by this AgentEndpoint instance. This base implementation checks if the PriceUpdate is valid and publishes the IncomingPriceUpdateEvent.
        Specified by:
        handlePriceUpdate in interface AgentEndpoint
        Overrides:
        handlePriceUpdate in class BaseAgentEndpoint
        Parameters:
        priceUpdate - The new Price, wrapped in a PriceUpdate, along with the id of the Bid it was based on.

      • transformBid

        protected Bid transformBid(Bid aggregatedBid)
        This method should be overridden when the bid that will be sent has to be changed.
        Parameters:
        aggregatedBid - The (input) aggregated bid as calculated normally (the sum of all the bids of the agents).
        Returns:
        The bid that will be sent to the matcher that is connected to this Concentrator.

      • transformPrice

        protected Price transformPrice(Price price,
                   SentBidInformation info)
        This method should be overridden when the price that will be sent down has to be changed. This is called just before the price will be sent down to the connected agents.
        Parameters:
        price - The input price update as received from the connected matcher.
        info - The information about the bid that has been send
        Returns:
        The Price as it has to be sent to the connected agents.
